text: Umusi Imana izobakoranya mwese, kubera uwo musi w’ukwegeranywa, uwo niwo musi w’uruhombo rw’abantu babi, n’uwemera Imana yiwe y’ukuri izomu hanagurira amabi yiwe yose nukumwinjiza mu mirima yo mw’Ijuru icamwo inzuzi imbere yiwe, hanyuma baze babeyo mu buzima bwabo bwose, iyo niyo ntsinzi niniya
